description:
This is an update for Disney Magical World--if you own Disney Magical World, we recommend downloading it.

This update adds several messages to clarify and optimize your experience when playing Disney Magical World.
name:
Disney Magical World
Update Ver. 1.1
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
